title: Front Desk Officer Job at Amies Recruitment Agency
content:
Amies Recruitment Agency is a bridge company that connects employers to the right talent.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Officer

Job Location: Utako, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: Administrative Manager / HR Manager / CEO
Work Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:00AM – 5:00PM

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Front Desk / Admin Assistant will serve as the first point of contact for the organization—welcoming guests, managing calls, and ensuring smooth administrative operations.
	The role involves providing clerical support to management and other departments, maintaining office organization, and promoting a professional company image.


Key Responsibilities
Front Desk Duties:


	Greet and attend to visitors, clients, and vendors in a friendly and professional manner.
	Answer, screen, and direct phone calls and emails promptly.
	Manage front office activities, including maintaining a neat and welcoming reception area.
	Handle incoming and outgoing correspondence, packages, and deliveries.


Administrative Support:


	Maintain and update office records, databases, and filing systems (both digital and physical).
	Schedule meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements for management.
	Prepare and circulate memos, reports, and meeting minutes.
	Assist with procurement and inventory of office supplies.
	Support HR and operations teams with documentation, onboarding, and other administrative tasks.
	Follow up on internal and external communications and ensure timely responses.


Other Duties:


	Ensure compliance with office policies and procedures.
	Support in organizing company events or meetings.
	Perform other related tasks as may be assigned by management.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc Degree in Business Administration, Office Management, or a related field.
	1 - 3 years of proven experience in a similar administrative or front desk role.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Strong organizational skills with attention to detail.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint).
	Ability to multitask, prioritize, and work independently.
	Professional appearance and courteous demeanor.


Salary
N55,000 - N60,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their application letter & CV to: amiesrecruitmentagency@gmail.com using "Application for Front Desk - Danobis Properties" as the subject of the mail.
